title: Client suddenly wants to start bug splatting.
body:
I already played a game just today. Went to play Civ 5 with a friend, ate lunch, watched an episode of One Punch man and the 2 games I queue for I just immediately get this bullshit as soon as we move to the loading screen. 

http://i.imgur.com/gwcWFxd.png

Riot, Seriously... come on...

replies.body: The client can throw this Bug Splat for a number of different reasons, but if it's happening every time you try to queue for a game it makes me believe that some of the game files somehow were corrupted. Check out our [**Bug Splat Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974) for some steps you can take to check for corrupted files.
It's happening to me too, everytime i try to qeue or in champ select, I tried repairing the client and it's the same.
